mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Timmel, Ferdinand
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Roane Co., VA [Roane County, West Virginia]
Spencer, Roane Co., VA [Spencer, Roane County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Timmel, Ferdinand Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound right thoracic parietus. Ball entered external border of pectoralis major passed 2 inches below axillia and through anterior border of trapezieus middle . Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Treatment: Simple dressings. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
